## Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(leaflet)
```


## Read data
```{r}

## Read in data
geoDF <- read.table(file = "../data/geo/geodata.txt", sep = ",", header = TRUE)
head(geoDF)
```

## Prepare data
```{r}
geoDF$time <- geoDF$time %>% ymd_hms
geoDF <- filter(geoDF, type == "T")
```

## Build map
```{r}
m <- leaflet(geoDF)
m <- addTiles(m)
m <- addCircles(m, lng=~longitude, lat=~latitude, popup=~time, radius = 3, color = "tomato")
m
```
